name: Yurasa's Dream
description:
Different entities appear in the dream of a young girl asking for help. In order to be able to help, she will need to prove her strength, but not only her destructive power but also her ability to avoid enemies' attacks.

Yurasa's Dream is a shoot 'em up with bullet hell features where you can take control of a young girl in her dreams to finish a great amount of enemies and prove your strength to those who are asking for help.

Easy to play, but hard to win! Playing the game is simple. You only need the arrow keys (to move) and two more keys to do all the actions. But will you be able to complete each stage?

Controls

- Movement: ↑↓←→
- Accept/Shoot: Z
- Cancel/Barrier: X
- Pause: Space bar

Developed by Kuremei with the help of:

- Concept art:

Ateliz

- Music:

水里

- Pixel Art:

Aku

Pixeldoshi

hako

Sound effects from:

-RPG Maker MV SFX library

-Fantasy Game Sounds

-RPG Magic SFX Pack 2

-Pirate Game Sounds Pack 

Features planned for future updates:

-New type of enemies

-Attack patterns polished

-New stages before last one and continuing the story (each one with its own original BGM)

-UI update (for stage selection and pause)

-Bugs correction

-A screen to see the best 5 scores for each stage

-Attack animations for characters who don't have
